document_data.name: Imbaerl
document_data.home:
[[Baldur's Gate]], [[Sword Coast]]
[[Waterdeep]], [[Sword Coast North]]It is unknown if Imbaerl hailed ''from'' Baldur's Gate or went ''to'' Baldur's Gate.
document_data.mainbody:
'''Imbaerl''' was a female [[human]] [[wizard]] living in [[Baldur's Gate]] on the [[Sword Coast]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

She was an apprentice of [[Kappiyan Flurmastyr]] of [[Waterdeep]] and was a notable sorceress and accomplished mage before the 1360s DR.
